sentences.en: ...public buildings with little bits of decoration and embellishment.
A master packager knows how to integrate art and any traces of embellishment.
sentences.cn: 包装的高手在于不留痕迹,外在的一切应与自身浑然一体.

sentences.en: A word or phrase interpolated as an embellishment in the sung parts of certain medieval liturgies.
sentences.cn: 对书的修饰、建筑物的装饰、言语的润色.

sentences.en: Embellishment of space and beautify life!
Gradually we once strangers to shed tears is superfluous embellishment, I to whom?
sentences.cn: 渐渐地,我们曾经陌生人流出了眼泪是多余的点缀, 我是属于谁 呢 ?

sentences.en: His articles are natural and without embellishment.
sentences.cn: 他的文章不事雕琢,自然质朴.

sentences.en: I am sensible they might tend very much to the embellishment of my paper.
sentences.cn: 我明知他们也许足以为本报生色.

sentences.en: I would like to design shoes are purple, and above there are some nice pictures embellishment.
sentences.cn: 我想设计的皮鞋是紫色的, 上面有一些漂亮的图片点缀.

sentences.en: Its most important communicative principles include principle of evasiveness, principle of politeness, principle of embellishment.
sentences.cn: 它最主要的原则有:避讳原则,礼貌原则, 掩饰 、 美化原则.

sentences.en: The towers were notable for the relationship of their simple, light embellishment to their underlying structure.
sentences.cn: 该塔是显着的关系,其简单, 轻点缀其基本结构.

sentences.en: The very laborer , with his thatched cottage and narrow slip of ground, attends to their embellishment.
sentences.cn: 劳其力者,虽居茅庐陋室, 耕方寸薄地, 亦知修身饰居.

sentences.en: Truscott's verbosity made it hard to separate plain fact from decorative embellishment.
sentences.cn: 特拉斯科特说话啰唆，让人很难分清哪是纯粹的事实哪是添油加醋的修饰之辞。

trans.tran_en: An embellishment is a decoration added to something to make it seem more attractive or interesting
